title: PM Modi to inaugurate power projects worth Rs 28,978 crore on Feb 3
description: Prime Minister Narendra Modi will inaugurate NTPC Ltd's Darlipali thermal power plant and Rourkela PP-II expansion project in Odisha. The Darlipali unit is a pit-head station with supply pacts with multiple states. The Rourkela PP-II expansion project will provide reliable power for the steel plant. Furthermore, the Prime Minister will lay the foundation stone for Talcher project in Odisha, with a capacity dedicated to Odisha, Tamil Nadu, Gujarat, and Assam.
